message_history.content:
Answer the given question. You must conduct reasoning inside <think> and </think> first every time you get new information. After reasoning, if you find you lack some knowledge, you can call a search engine by <search> query </search> and it will return the top searched results between <information> and </information>. You can search as many times as your want. If you find no further external knowledge needed, you can directly provide the answer inside <answer> and </answer>, without detailed illustrations. For example, <answer> Beijing </answer>. Question: I’ve been in a bit of a reading slump and want to find some new books. Could you please compile a list of the winners of all categories from the Annual Goodreads Choice Awards for each year from 2022 to 2024 (including 2024), as well as the top ten best sellers on Amazon for those same years? Also, please include each author’s name and nationality, and the genre of the book (select from Fiction/Non-fiction).

Please output the organized data in Markdown table format.
The column names are as follows in sequence: Award, Award Year, Genre, Book Title, Author, Nationality
Note:
Only list one book per row;
In the "Award" column, you need to distinguish between the "Annual Goodreads Choice Awards" and the "Amazon Best Sellers in Books".

Don't ask me any questions, just output the results according to the columns without omitting cells arbitrarily. The output format is ```markdown
{data_content}
```.?

To compile the required data, I need to gather information on winners of the Annual Goodreads Choice Awards and top ten best sellers on Amazon for Fiction/Non-fiction genres from 2022 to 2024.

<search>Annual Goodreads Choice Awards winners Fiction/Non-fiction 2022-2024</search>

Search query: Annual Goodreads Choice Awards winners Fiction/Non-fiction 2022-2024
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.goodreads.com/award/show/21332-goodreads-choice-award):
Goodreads Choice Award Winners Winners ; Everything Is Tuberculosis:... Everything Is Tuberculosis: The History and Persistence of Our Deadliest Infection by. John Green (Goodreads Author).

[Doc 2](https://www.goodreads.com/blog/show/2879-meet-the-winners-of-the-2024-goodreads-choice-awards):
Meet the Winners of the 2024 Goodreads Choice Awards Other returning winners include Kristin Hannah, T.J. Klune, Sarah J. Maas, Alice Oseman, and Rebecca Ross. We had a few landslide victories this ...

[Doc 3](https://www.goodreads.com/choiceawards/readers-favorite-nonfiction-books-2024):
Readers' Favorite Nonfiction 2024 — Goodreads Choice Awards Fiction · Graphic Novels · Historical Fiction · History · Horror · Memoir · Music ... WINNER. 39,553 votes. The Anxious Generation by Jonathan Haidt. The Anxious ...

Based on these sources:

<search>Top ten best sellers on Amazon Fiction/Non-fiction 2022-2024</search>

Search query: Top ten best sellers on Amazon Fiction/Non-fiction 2022-2024
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.amazon.com/Best-Sellers-Nonfiction/zgbs/digital-text/157325011):
Amazon Best Sellers: Best Nonfiction #1 · Strangers: A Memoir of Marriage ; #2 · The Let Them Theory: A Life-Changing Tool That Millions of People Can't Stop Talking About ; #3 · Into Thin Air ; #4.

[Doc 2](https://www.amazon.com/charts/2024-01-07/mostsold/nonfiction/ref=dp_chrtbg_dbs_1):
Most Sold Nonfiction | Amazon Charts Amazon's Most Sold charts rank books according to the number of copies sold and pre-ordered through Amazon.com, Audible.com, Amazon Books stores, and books ...

[Doc 3](https://www.nytimes.com/books/best-sellers/):
Best Sellers - Books - The New York Times Paperback Nonfiction · THE BODY KEEPS THE SCORE · ON TYRANNY · I'M GLAD MY MOM DIED · SIGNS · THINKING, FAST AND SLOW.
